p: At 24 h after treatment, cells were collected and lysed, and the protein concentration was determined by BCA assay (Pierce, Rockford, IL) for the further iTRAQ analysis. iTRAQ reagents were purchased from Applied Biosystems (Foster City, CA). Tris (2-carboxyethyl) phosphine hydrochloride (TCEP), trifluoro-acetic acid (TFA), HPLC-grade acetonitrile (ACN), and 4-(2-hydroxyethyl)-1-piperazineethanesulfonic acid (HEPES) were from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO) (more information in the Supporting Information).
